wikipedia_page.main:
William Henry Burton (1739-1818) was an Irish politician.Burton was born in County Carlow and educated at Kilkenny College and Trinity College, Dublin. He served as a captain in the 13th Dragoons from 1766 to 1770.
Burton represented  Gowran from 1761 until 1768 and County Carlow from 1768 until 1802.

response: * William Henry Burton 1767–1800Johnston-Liik, History of the Irish Parliament, vol. III, p. 330.
